Ok, I was able to get it to work after uninstalling and reinstalling all the vc++ and dx10 redistributables.

Don't know why, they worked for many other games, including the vanilla borderlands 2.

So if your game isn't launching or maybe getting the error 0x0 file not found thing, try reinstalling all the redistributables.

For those of you in which BL2 doesn't launch anymore after the update: you have to reinstall BL2 and install only this update.

This will work just fine with Steam/legit versions of BL2, if you skip copying the .exe files in the SKIDROW folder (step 5 of installation process). Copy the other files in the crack folder as you normally would. Note that this WILL break your ability to play non-LAN multiplayer, access the downloadable content menu, etc. It will function just as any other cracked version of a Steam game.

I have to error 0x0 in win7 but I finally fix it.
1. uniinstal game
2. instal steam ( only instal do not login )
3. instal borderlands 2
4. instal Borderlands 2 Update 4 incl DLC SKIDROW
5. instal Borderlands 2 Captain Scarlett and her Pirates Booty DLC SKIDROW and then copy crack

im barely downloading this but the problems that everybody has ive had em when updating b4 and a tutorial fixed em i dont remember the page but do this. copy and paste this into your notepad and save it as .reg          Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeValveSteam]
"InstallPath"="C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam"
"SteamPID"=dword:00000000
"TempAppCmdLine"=""
"TempAppPath"=""

This DLC worked for me without any problems..

- Backup your save game first of all (My documents/My Games/Borderlands 2)

- Install the DLC and the crack like it says in the .nfo file

TURN OFF YOUR ANTIVIRUS SLAB!

- Now install steam and play. Easy.

Can anyone tell me what version number this is? 1.1.4? And awesome btw, installed great, worked great, no problems. People installing a steam game for the first time need to stop flaming and just read comments before they actually post their B.S. most of you durrs need to just install steam and block it in firewall just in case, and thats it, dont log in, dont use it. just install it.. and always keep up to date with dotnet and the vcredists. anyways..... thanks for the update :D
